ssGUI
namespace
ssGUI
ssGUI::​CharacterRenderInfo
Variables
Advance
int Advance

How many pixels this character takes horizontally

DrawOffset
glm::vec2 DrawOffset

Offset for getting the top-left corner of the character

UVOrigin
glm::vec2 UVOrigin

The uv texture origin for this character

Size
glm::vec2 Size

The texture size corresponding to UVOrigin

RenderPosition
glm::vec2 RenderPosition

This is the left-most position of the character on the horizontal line.  To get the top-left corner of the character, add DrawOffset to this

CharacterAtNewline
bool CharacterAtNewline

True if this character is on a newline

Valid
bool Valid

True if this character is valid and being rendered. Otherwise this character is not being rendered.
